food_list.name: Fire-Grilled Royale Burger
food_list.description: A juicy flame-grilled chicken patty layered with fresh lettuce, roma tomatoes, and creamy house mayo, served inside a soft toasted brioche bun.

food_list.name: Ultimate Lava Cheese Burger
food_list.description: Overflowing molten cheddar melts over a crispy chicken, topped with smoky seasoning and crunchy veggies for a rich, indulgent cheese experience.

food_list.name: Double Crunch Burger
food_list.description: Two crispy chicken patties stacked with melted cheese, tangy signature sauce, and fresh toppingsâ€”crafted for true heavy-hunger champions.

food_list.name: Classic Chicken Burger
food_list.description: Simple, clean flavors: tender chicken patty, crisp lettuce, juicy tomato, and light mayo, served in a golden sesame bun for an everyday satisfying bite.

food_list.name: Cheesy Lasagna Roll
food_list.description: Soft sheets rolled with rich cheese and filling, baked for a perfect Italian-style bite.

food_list.name: Peri-Peri Fiery Chicken Roll
food_list.description: Spicy peri-peri seasoned chicken wrapped with fresh veggies for a bold, zesty flavor punch.

food_list.name: Classic Chicken Tikka Roll
food_list.description: Tender chicken tikka, fresh onions, and mint mayo wrapped in a warm flaky paratha.

food_list.name: Veggie Supreme Roll
food_list.description: A wholesome mix of spiced vegetables, crunchy salad, and creamy mayo in a soft wrap.

food_list.name: Veggie Loaded Pizza
food_list.description: Crispy base topped with fresh veggies and melted cheese.

food_list.name: Chicken Tikka Pizza
food_list.description: Bold chicken tikka with smoky spices and creamy cheese.

food_list.name: Pepperoni Pizza
food_list.description: A classic, cheesy pizza topped with perfectly crisp pepperoni slices. Bold in every hot delicious bite.

food_list.name: Farmhouse Mix Pizza
food_list.description: A tasty combo of tomato, mint leaves, capsicum, and onions.

food_list.name: Chicken Stacker Sandwich
food_list.description: Layered chicken with creamy mayo inside soft toasted bread.

food_list.name: Veggie Layer Sandwich
food_list.description: A fresh mix of fresh veggies with a light, flavorful and delicious spread.

food_list.name: Cheese Melt Sandwich
food_list.description: A soft, warm sandwich filled with melted cheese for a smooth, creamy bite.

food_list.name: Bread Sandwich
food_list.description: Simple bread sandwich filled with smooth mayo and gentle seasoning.

food_list.name: Cheesy Pasta
food_list.description: Rich, creamy cheese sauce tossed with soft pasta for a smooth, comforting bite.

food_list.name: Tangy Tomato Pasta
food_list.description: Pasta cooked in a fresh tomato base with herbs and a light tangy flavor.

food_list.name: Creamy White Sauce Pasta
food_list.description: A silky white sauce pasta blended with herbs and a smooth creamy finish.

food_list.name: Chicken Penne Pasta
food_list.description: Tender chicken pieces mixed in a creamy, flavorful sauce over perfectly cooked pasta.

food_list.name: Butter Tossed Noodles
food_list.description: Soft noodles lightly tossed in butter for a smooth, comforting taste.

food_list.name: Mixed Veg Noodles
food_list.description: Classic stir-fried noodles loaded with fresh vegetables.

food_list.name: Soft Somen Bowl
food_list.description: Light, delicate noodles served with a mild and soothing flavor.

food_list.name: Plain Stir Noodles
food_list.description: Simple, stir-cooked noodles with gentle seasoning, offering a light yet flavorful bite in every forkful.
